message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Could you consider that?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I can do $112, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $112 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $108?
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $108. I can meet you halfway between $108 and $112, which is $110. Would you be interested in that?
